parameters.name: Centerline

title: IDisplayDimension.SetExtensionLineAsCenterline
description: Sets whether the specified extension line is a centerline.
signature:
System.Boolean SetExtensionLineAsCenterline( 
   System.Int16
ExtIndex
,
   System.Boolean
Centerline
)

parameters.name: ExtIndex
parameters.description: Index of extension line to set

parameters.name: Centerline
parameters.description: True to make extension line a centerline, false to not

returns: True if successful, false if not
